subject: docs: align commit convention with urgency and impact dimensions
body:
Updated COMMIT_CONVENTION.md to match the extraction playbook schema:

- Added urgency/impact to commit message format
- New "Optional: Metadata Footers" section explaining usage
- Expanded "Metadata Indicators" section with urgency and impact tables
- Updated all examples to demonstrate the new fields
- Added optional items to commit checklist

Ensures manual commits can include the same metadata that AI analysis assigns.
